name: iSpell Word
description:
iSpell Word application will help kids to learn simple English words. Touch letters you can listen to letters’ pronunciation; Touch speaker icon can listen to the words pronunciation. Drag all letters to the special position, means one word spelling success, and then next word waits for you...


Main function:
1. There are five game levels. First level words’ length is 3,Second including 4 characters, Third is 5, Fourth is 6 and last level including 7 or 8 characters.
2. There are more than 100 English words in this game, include animals, fruits, tools etc. Five words will be random selected in every level.
3. Every word has relevant picture and pronunciation.
4. Very kind of game user interface for kids.
5. Player can do some setup of speech, Letter Hints, Background music, Letter Upper case or lowercase，Display Chinese tips.
Thank you for your playing and welcome to give me good suggestion.
